desc: 30% boost to all parameters, raises normal hit amount, 30% boost to critical hit rate, 100% boost to critical damage, probable normal attack on all foes & raises Atk parameter limits to 150000

dictionary.lore: Elphelt's signature rocket launcher is the stylish way to blow up your enemies. Alternatively, you can use it to perform impromptu firework shows for monstrous villains...before you blow them up.

name: Explosive Genoverse
